name: Cow Evolution
description:
Cow Evolution is an indie puzzle game developed by Tapps Tecnologia da Informação Ltda.. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Tapps Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA.. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Cow Evolution is available on iOS and Android. You can purchase the game on Google Play, Xbox Store and App Store.
